short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your time with hands-free YouTube Shorts viewing. Auto-scroll when videos end and track your watching stats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoScroll Pro makes watching YouTube Shorts effortless. It auto-scrolls to the next video when one ends, giving you a hands-free experience. Track how many Shorts you’ve watched and see how much time you’ve saved with real-time stats.

Simple, lightweight, and easy to use—AutoScroll Pro is your perfect companion for a smoother YouTube Shorts binge.
